message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to consider acquiring this item. My initial offer is $15000. I understand its value might be subjective, but I assure you, it's an exceptional opportunity.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to pay $12000 for it.
